name: Kevin S. Bright
info:
• 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1954-11-15
  • 出生地: New York City, New York, United States
  • 职业: Television producer, television director
detail: Kevin S. Bright (born November 15, 1954) is an American television executive producer and director whose credits include Dream On, Friends, Auto-B-Good and Joey.

works.name: Friends (Season 1) / 老友记 第一季
